A Bubba Watson Foundation Event benefitting:

Get Loud. Give Back.

About Bubba's Bash

Bubba's Bash 2015

The 2015 Bubba’s Bash charity concert will feature country music stars Rascal Flatts- the most awarded country group of the past decade, former American Idol winner, Scotty McCreery, and more.  Hosted by 8-time PGA Tour winner, 2-time Masters Champion and Pensacola native Bubba Watson, who created the annual event in 2012 as a fun way to give back to the community. This year is Bubba's Bash is coming to Pensacola, Florida for the first time and will raise funds to support local charities including The Children’s Hospital at Sacred Heart, The YMCA of Northwest Florida and Santa Rosa Kids’ House.  These organizations make a positive impact in the lives of countless children and families every day so please join us for an unforgettable evening of live entertainment and help support a great cause.  Every ticket sold makes a difference!
